Faith.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
Faith.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Faith.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
Faith.author: Saint Augustine

Love.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
Love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Love.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
Love.author: Loretta Young

Understanding.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
Understanding.author: Albert Einstein

Understanding.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
Understanding.author: J.K. Rowling
